verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou <S%H410>God<s%> to whom <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> <S%H410>belongeth<s%>, Thou God to whom <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> <S%H3313>belongeth<s%>, shine forth.
Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H8199>thyself<s%>, thou judge of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H7725>Render<s%> to the <S%H1343>proud<s%> their <S%H1576>desert<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, how long shall the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, How long shall the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5937>triumph<s%>?
They <S%H5042>prate<s%>, they <S%H5042>speak<s%> <S%H6277>arrogantly<s%>: All the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> boast <S%H559>themselves<s%>.
They break in <S%H1792>pieces<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And <S%H6031>afflict<s%> thy <S%H5159>heritage<s%>.
They <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> and the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>, And <S%H7523>murder<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>.
And they <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%> will not <S%H7200>see<s%>, Neither will the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%>.
Consider <S%H995><s%>, ye <S%H1197>brutish<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>; And ye <S%H3684>fools<s%>, when will ye be <S%H7919>wise<s%>?
He that <S%H5193>planted<s%> the <S%H241>ear<s%>, shall he not <S%H8085>hear<s%>? He that <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H5869>eye<s%>, shall he not <S%H5027>see<s%>?
He that <S%H3256>chastiseth<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, shall not he <S%H3198>correct<s%>, Even he that <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>?
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, That they are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> whom thou <S%H3256>chastenest<s%>, O <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>, And <S%H3925>teachest<s%> out of thy <S%H8451>law<s%>;
That thou mayest give him <S%H8252>rest<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7451>adversity<s%>, Until the <S%H7845>pit<s%> be <S%H3738>digged<s%> for the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will not cast <S%H5203>off<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, Neither will he <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
For <S%H4941>judgment<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; And all the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall follow <S%H310>it<s%>.
Who will rise <S%H6965>up<s%> for me against the <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%>? Who will stand <S%H3320>up<s%> for me against the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>?
Unless <S%H3884><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had been my <S%H5833>help<s%>, My <S%H5315>soul<s%> had <S%H4592>soon<s%> <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1745>silence<s%>.
When I <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4131>slippeth<s%>; Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, held me <S%H5582>up<s%>.
In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of my <S%H8312>thoughts<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me Thy <S%H8575>comforts<s%> <S%H8173>delight<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Shall the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1942>wickedness<s%> have <S%H2266>fellowship<s%> with <S%H3335>thee<s%>, Which frameth <S%H5999>mischief<s%> by <S%H2706>statute<s%>?
They gather themselves <S%H1413>together<s%> against the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, And <S%H7561>condemn<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath been my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>, And my <S%H430>God<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H4268>refuge<s%>.

And he hath <S%H7725>brought<s%> upon them their own <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, And will cut them <S%H6789>off<s%> in their own <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> will cut them <S%H6789>off<s%>.
